title: Republic TV Airs Two-Year Old Video as Exclusive ‘Pak Army Expose’
subtitle: Fact Check: Republic TV in its bulletin said that they had accessed the footage which showed Pakistan Army hiding in a civilian’s house in POK. But we found out that the video is nearly two years old.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video, that is at least two years old and available via open sources online, was telecast as an “exclusive” report by Republic TV recently to show how the Pakistan Army is hiding in civilian houses and using civilian areas for rocket attacks in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (PoK) to target the Indian territory.

The bulletin, which was uploaded by the channel’s official YouTube handle on 20 May, relies on the visuals to talk about how Pakistan is using civilians as a “shield”, but it fails to mention that the video is not a recent one.
